item.title: Pixicam
item.description: Introduction Place all your objects in a world which is rendered based on 2d camera transformation. So you can zoom & translate your world with any size (think of platformer, tilemap). This world is a simple container so you can maintain other layers to render a HUD or menu on top of of your camera renderer world. Camera use cases Zoom to a target Zoom to fit a view area Follow Target Constrained View Change Zoom Pivot Running example Use the minimap to pan the scene Use your mousewheel to zoom.
